articles.title: Poland in 'very tough' World Cup group, says Lewandowski
articles.description: Poland's Robert Lewandowski said they have been handed a difficult group alongside Argentina, Mexico and Saudi Arabia at the World Cup in Qatar but he believes they can progress.
articles.content:
Oct 21 (Reuters) - Poland's Robert Lewandowski said they have been handed a difficult group alongside Argentina, Mexico and Saudi Arabia at the World Cup in Qatar but he believes they can progress.

articles.title: Families, Your YouTube Premium Plan is Getting More Expensive
articles.description: Users in the U.S., Canada, U.K., Argentina, Turkey, and Japan will see a price hike next month.
articles.content:
Hey YouTube Premium users! Get ready to fork over a little more cash for your family plan—YouTube has alerted users of a price increase from $17.99 per month to $22.99 per month in the U.S. effective November 21.
In an email to current subscribers, Y... [2314 chars]

articles.title: Argentina fear no one at World Cup, says Lionel Messi
articles.description: Argentina began their 2018 World Cup campaign with a 1-1 draw against Iceland a game in which Messi missed a penalty and finished second in their group before being knocked out by eventual winners France in the last 16.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi says Argentina to not fear any team at the World Cup but he urged fans to stay calm with the tournament in Qatar less than a month away.
Copa America champions Argentina, unbeaten in 35 games since 2019, were drawn with Saudi Arabia, Mex... [1369 chars]

articles.description: YouTube is raising prices for its Premium subscription plans across many countries including the US, the UK, Canada, and Argentina.

articles.title: Margot Robbie and Cara Delevingne involved in a confrontation with a paparazzo in Argentina
articles.description: The actresses Margot Robbie And Cara Delevingnevery friends in life, were involved in a fight with a paparazzo in Argentina. According to the gossip site TMZ, the two actresses were leaving a Buenos Aires restaurant Sunday when they were targeted by a paparazzo while getting into the car.
